mapper.select: SELECT PRO_NO, C_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_PERIOD, PRO_PRICE, PRO_PLAN, PRO_partners, PRO_SKILL, PRO_FILE, PRO_END, PRO_START, PRO_ADDR, PRO_MANAGEMENT, PRO_CONTENTS FROM project
select cate_sub from category where cate_main = '개발'
select cate_sub from category where cate_main = '디자인'

{CALL proc_pagination( #{pagenumber, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=int}, #{pagecount, mode=IN, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=int}, #{tablesize, mode=OUT, jdbcType=NUMERIC, javaType=int}, #{result, mode=OUT, jdbcType=CURSOR, javaType=java.sql.ResultSet, resultMap=testMap}) }
